alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 1:07PM PDT until August 20 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... Northeastern San Diego County in southwestern California... * Until 145 PM PDT. * At 107 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Salton Sea Beach, or 12 miles north of Salton City, moving northwest at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Indio, southeastern Palm Springs, Coachella, Palm Desert, Hwy 74 Between Anza And Palm Desert, Thermal, Hwy S22 Between Borrego Springs And Imperial County Line, Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, La Quinta, Mecca, Indian Wells, Santa Rosa Mountain, and Bermuda Dunes. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
